title: God is Faithful
description:
Readings from:

Deuteronomy 7:9-10

Psalm 89:1-2

Lamentations 3:21-23

1 Corinthians 10:12-13

1 John 1:9

Today's passages were read by Kristi Kirby. Kristi works in campus ministry at Illinois State University and Eureka College.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
